segments.text: I notice the little boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s doing this right under his mom’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, like they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be careful before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and the floor is wet—this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the mom ever pays attention to what’s going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he doesn’t even realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and break something—or worse, hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me nervous just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR
